virtual-sensor.name: Jungfraujoch_Dozer_BaseStatus__conv
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerBaseStatusMsg) from Jungfraujoch deployment converted

source.query: select timed, POSITION, DEVICE_ID, TIMESTAMP, GENERATION_TIME, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_NO, PAYLOAD_UPTIME, PAYLOAD_QUEUESIZE, PAYLOAD_PACKETSSENT, PAYLOAD_PACKETSRECEIVED, PAYLOAD_CHILDCOUNT, PAYLOAD_RSSI, cast(round((0.01*PAYLOAD_TEMPERATURE)-39.63, 2) as CHAR(30)) as TEMPERATURE, cast(round(((0.01*PAYLOAD_TEMPERATURE)-64.63)*(0.01+(0.00008*PAYLOAD_HUMIDITY))+((0.0405*PAYLOAD_HUMIDITY)-4-(0.0000028*POWER(PAYLOAD_HUMIDITY,2))), 1) as CHAR(30)) as HUMIDITY, cast(round(PAYLOAD_MSPVOLTAGE * (3.0/4095), 2) as CHAR(30)) as MSPVOLTAGE, cast(round((PAYLOAD_MSPTEMPERATURE * (1.5/4095) - 0.986) / 0.00355, 2) as CHAR(30)) as MSPTEMPERATURE from wrapper
